<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Current.VisitCount == StackElem::KVisitedOnce) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Walk the bits in the bitmap.  A bit set to &#39;1&#39; indicates that the test</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// vector at the corresponding index was executed during a test run.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> findExecutedTestVectors() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the binary decision diagram to enumerate all possible test vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We start at the root node (ID == 0) with all values being DontCare.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;TVIdx&#96; starts with 0 and is in the traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;Index&#96; encodes the bitmask of true values and is initially 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MCDCRecord::TestVector TV(NumConditions);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">    buildTestVector(TV, 0, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TVIdxs.size() == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(NumTestVectors) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;TVIdxs wasn&#39;t fulfilled&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill ExecVectors order by False items and True items.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ExecVectors is the alias of ExecVectorsByCond&#91;false&#93;, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Append ExecVectorsByCond&#91;true&#93; on it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ExecVectorsT = ExecVectorsByCond&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ExecVectors.append(std::make&#95;move&#95;iterator(ExecVectorsT.begin()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       std::make&#95;move&#95;iterator(ExecVectorsT.end()));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Process the MC/DC Record in order to produce a result for a boolean</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// expression. This process includes tracking the conditions that comprise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the decision region, calculating the list of all possible test vectors,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// marking the executed test vectors, and then finding an Independence Pair</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// out of the executed test vectors for each condition in the boolean</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// expression. A condition is tracked to ensure that its ID can be mapped to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// its ordinal position in the boolean expression. The condition&#39;s source</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// location is also tracked, as well as whether it is constant folded (in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// which case it is excuded from the metric).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-coveragemapping-cpp-/mcdcrecordprocessor/#adbbbd2393a335a673e48fc85db8471f3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord">MCDCRecord</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-coveragemapping-cpp-/mcdcrecordprocessor/#adbbbd2393a335a673e48fc85db8471f3">processMCDCRecord</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/#aa673020429a0011959354e2b60fe75d6">MCDCRecord::CondIDMap</a> PosToID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/#aa83254d71f109cbacac8c1ec3451333f">MCDCRecord::LineColPairMap</a> CondLoc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk the Record&#39;s BranchRegions (representing Conditions) in order to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Hash the condition based on its corresponding ID. This will be used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   calculate the test vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Keep a map of the condition&#39;s ordinal position (1, 2, 3, 4) to its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   actual ID.  This will be used to visualize the conditions in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   correct order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Keep track of the condition source location. This will be used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   visualize where the condition is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Record whether the condition is constant folded so that we exclude it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   from being measured.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Branches)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;BranchParams = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;getBranchParams();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PosToID&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = BranchParams.ID;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CondLoc&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>-&gt;startLoc();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This holds the DecisionRegion and MCDCBranches under it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CompletedRegionsIt = ActiveRegions.begin() + FirstCompletedRegion;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &#42;L, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &#42;R) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        return L-&gt;endLoc() &lt; R-&gt;endLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit segments for all completed regions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = FirstCompletedRegion + 1, E = ActiveRegions.size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; E;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">         ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CompletedRegion = ActiveRegions&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> || CompletedRegion-&gt;endLoc() &lt;= &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Completed region ends after start of new region&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PrevCompletedRegion = ActiveRegions&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CompletedSegmentLoc = PrevCompletedRegion-&gt;endLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t emit any more segments if they start where the new region begins.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> &amp;&amp; CompletedSegmentLoc == &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t emit a segment if the next completed region ends at the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// location as this one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CompletedSegmentLoc == CompletedRegion-&gt;endLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the count from the last completed region which ends at this loc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1; J &lt; E; ++J)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CompletedRegion-&gt;endLoc() == ActiveRegions&#91;J&#93;-&gt;endLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CompletedRegion = ActiveRegions&#91;J&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">      startSegment(&#42;CompletedRegion, CompletedSegmentLoc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a> = ActiveRegions.back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstCompletedRegion &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc() != &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there&#39;s a gap after the end of the last completed region and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// start of the new region, use the last active region to fill the gap.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlight">      startSegment(&#42;ActiveRegions&#91;FirstCompletedRegion - 1&#93;, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">                   </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FirstCompletedRegion &amp;&amp; (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> || &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a> != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit a skipped segment if there are no more active regions. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ensures that gaps between functions are marked correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      startSegment(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac10d13c57a7adf4a1f140afd5321309bad55b30607c2a9a2616347d6edb789f6b">Last</a>-&gt;endLoc(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pop the completed regions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ActiveRegions.erase(CompletedRegionsIt, ActiveRegions.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> buildSegmentsImpl(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CountedRegion&gt;</a> Regions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;CR : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">enumerate</a>(Regions)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurStartLoc = CR.value().startLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Active regions which end before the current region need to be popped.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CompletedRegions =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::stable&#95;partition(ActiveRegions.begin(), ActiveRegions.end(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  return !(Region-&gt;endLoc() &lt;= CurStartLoc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CompletedRegions != ActiveRegions.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstCompletedRegion =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><span class="doxyHighlight">            std::distance(ActiveRegions.begin(), CompletedRegions);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">        completeRegionsUntil(CurStartLoc, FirstCompletedRegion);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GapRegion = CR.value().Kind == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ac031257b3294c6d8ae4afab2dd9e6edf">CounterMappingRegion::GapRegion</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to emit a segment for the current region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurStartLoc == CR.value().endLoc()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid making zero-length regions active. If it&#39;s the last region,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emit a skipped segment. Otherwise use its predecessor&#39;s count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Skipped =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">            (CR.index() + 1) == Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">            CR.value().Kind == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493abbe924008d232ccec58896a8d143db42">CounterMappingRegion::SkippedRegion</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">        startSegment(ActiveRegions.empty() ? CR.value() : &#42;ActiveRegions.back(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     CurStartLoc, !GapRegion, Skipped);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it is skipped segment, create a segment with last pushed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regions&#39;s count at CurStartLoc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Skipped &amp;&amp; !ActiveRegions.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">          startSegment(&#42;ActiveRegions.back(), CurStartLoc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CR.index() + 1 == Regions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CurStartLoc != Regions&#91;CR.index() + 1&#93;.startLoc()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit a segment if the next region doesn&#39;t start at the same location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as this one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">        startSegment(CR.value(), CurStartLoc, !GapRegion);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This region is active (i.e not completed).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ActiveRegions.push&#95;back(&amp;CR.value());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Complete any remaining active regions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ActiveRegions.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">      completeRegionsUntil(std::nullopt, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Sort a nested sequence of regions from a single file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> sortNestedRegions(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;CountedRegion&gt;</a> Regions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">llvm::sort</a>(Regions, &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &amp;LHS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countedregion">CountedRegion</a> &amp;RHS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.startLoc() != RHS.startLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHS.startLoc() &lt; RHS.startLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.endLoc() != RHS.endLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When LHS completely contains RHS, we sort LHS first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHS.endLoc() &lt; LHS.endLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If LHS and RHS cover the same area, we need to sort them according</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to their kinds so that the most suitable region will become &quot;active&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in combineRegions(). Because we accumulate counter values only from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regions of the same kind as the first region of the area, prefer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CodeRegion to ExpansionRegion and ExpansionRegion to SkippedRegion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;assert</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ad1c0402f0bac0395dcc0cd8b0a5c43d4">CounterMappingRegion::CodeRegion</a> &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a185ca3ad8ff2f6fefd469d805a2657fc">CounterMappingRegion::ExpansionRegion</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a185ca3ad8ff2f6fefd469d805a2657fc">CounterMappingRegion::ExpansionRegion</a> &lt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion/#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493abbe924008d232ccec58896a8d143db42">CounterMappingRegion::SkippedRegion</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unexpected order of region kind values&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHS.Kind &lt; RHS.Kind;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge duplicate region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If CodeRegions and ExpansionRegions cover the same area, it&#39;s probably</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a macro which is fully expanded to another macro. In that case, we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to accumulate counts only from CodeRegions, or else the area will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// counted twice.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On the other hand, a macro may have a nested macro in its body. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// outer macro is used several times, the ExpansionRegion for the nested</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// macro will also be added several times. These ExpansionRegions cover</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same source locations and have to be combined to reach the correct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value for that area.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We add counts of the regions of the same kind as the active region</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to handle the both situations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Kind == Active-&gt;Kind)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Active-&gt;ExecutionCount += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;ExecutionCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
